quote: When your will is God's will, you will have your will.
author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon

quote: because he's Will
author: Philip Pullman,  The Amber Spyglass

quote: Honey! Bring down a copy of my will - and an eraser!
author: Woody Allen

quote: Will you be my forever, Donia?
author: Melissa Marr,  Darkest Mercy

quote: Always have something to look forward to
author: Vici Howard

quote: Justice will prevail!
author: Tsugumi Ohba

quote: Mind your mind, soon, you will mine from it.
author: Ogwo David Emenike

quote: Things will get easier, people's minds will change, and you should be alive to see it.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: and I ask myself and you, which of our visions will claim uswhich will we claimhow will we go on livinghow will we touch, what will we knowwhat will we say to each other.
author: Adrienne Rich

quote: first of all nothing will happen and a little laternothing will happen again
author: Leonard Cohen,  Book of Longing

quote: What's meant to be will always find a way
author: Trisha Yearwood

quote: You shall know the truth and the truth shall make you mad.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: I...will never...regret you.
author: Colleen Hoover,  Maybe Someday

quote: Never say never
author: Charles Dickens

quote: If we can acquire an attitude of self-belief, then we will surely determine our future actions and our future life opportunities.
author: Stephen Richards,  Boost Your Self Esteem

quote: Will rolled up his sleeves. "We'll probably have to knock down the door--""Or,"said Jem, reaching out and giving the knob a twist, "not."The door swung open onto a rectangle of darkness. "Now, that's simply laziness,"said Will.
author: Cassandra Clare,  Clockwork Angel

quote: Let your hopes, not your hurts, shape your future.
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: I will always find a way and a way will always find me.
author: Charles F. Glassman,  Brain Drain The Breakthrough That Will Change Your Life

quote: Come live with me and be my Love, And we will all the pleasures prove
author: Christopher Marlowe,  The Complete Plays and Poems

quote: You'll stop hurting when you stop hoping.
author: Guillaume Musso,  Seras-tu là?

quote: We will experience the life we have the faith to experience.
author: Julia Cameron,  Faith and Will: Weathering the Storms in Our Spiritual Lives

quote: You will do foolish things, but do them with enthusiasm.
author: Colette

quote: I know not all that may be coming, but be it what it will, I'll go to it laughing.
author: Herman Melville,  Moby-Dick; or, The Whale

quote: I will not know that day has come because I will not stop trying.
author: Brandon Mull,  Rise of the Evening Star

quote: the truth will set u free but first it will piss u off
author: Albert Borris,  Crash Into Me

quote: Please don't die.
author: Randy Pausch,  The Last Lecture

quote: I will follow you to the ends of the world.
author: Khaled Hosseini,  A Thousand Splendid Suns

quote: If you believe you can, you might. If you know you can, you will.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Never give up...No one knows what's going to happen next.
author: L. Frank Baum

quote: I'll love you to ruins.
author: Michelle Hodkin,  The Retribution of Mara Dyer

quote: I'm telling you a lie in a vicious effort that you will repeat my lie over and over until it becomes true
author: Lady Gaga

quote: I assess the power of a will by how much resistance, pain, torture it endures and knows how to turn to its advantage
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Faith is not Desire. Faith is Will. Desires are things that need to be satisfied, whereas Will is a force. Will changes the space around us,...
author: Paulo Coelho,  The Witch Of Portobello

quote: you can, you should, and if you’re brave enough to start, you will.
author: Stephen King,  On Writing: A Memoir of the Craft

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: I am hope.
author: Neil Gaiman,  The Sandman, Vol. 1: Preludes and Nocturnes

quote: No! Try not. Do, or do not. There is no try.
author: George Lucas,  The Star Wars Trilogy

quote: What is wanted is not the will to believe, but the will to find out, which is the exact opposite.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: All who call on God in true faith, earnestly from the heart, will certainly be heard, and will receive what they have asked and desired.
author: Martin Luther

quote: Great, tell me when you've defeated Voldemort for me, will you?
author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quote: Nothing ever happens like you imagine it will
author: John Green,  Paper Towns

quote: Memories of our lives, of our works and our deeds will continue in others.
author: Rosa Parks

quote: And will you succeed?Yes! You will, indeed!(98 and 3/4 percent guaranteed.)KID, YOU'LL MOVE MOUNTAINS!So...be your name Buxbaum or Bixby or Brayor Mordecai Ali Van Allen O'Shea,you're off to Great Places!Today is your day!Your mountain is waiting.So...get on your way!
author: Dr. Seuss,  Oh, The Places You'll Go!

quote: God will answer you prayers better than you think. Of course, one will not always get exactly what he has asked for....We all have sorrows and disappointments, but one must never forget that, if commended to God, they will issue in good....His own solution is far better than any we could conceive.
author: Fanny J. Crosby

quote: Take the first step. No more, no less, and the next will be revealed.
author: Clement Watt

quote: When you make a choice, you change the future.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: You will not be punished for your anger; you will be punished by your anger.
author: Gautama Buddha

quote: It will hurt."said Petra. "But let's make the most of what we have, and not let future pain ruin present happiness.
author: Orson Scott Card,  Shadow Puppets

quote: Future is one of the wildest experiences that you will ever have.
author: J.T.Abraham

quote: There’s always a choice. That’s God’s way, always will be. Your will is still free. Do as you will. There’s no set of leg-irons on you. But... this is what God wants of you.
author: Stephen King,  The Stand
